name: michelin-star-hunter-backend
description: Backend API for Michelin Star Hunter

scripts.start:prod: npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma db seed && node dist/server.js
scripts.scrape-michelin: cd scripts && npm install && npm run scrape
scripts.seed-production: cd scripts && npm install && npm run seed-production
scripts.seed-production-clear: cd scripts && npm install && npm run seed-production-clear
scripts.refresh-restaurants: npm run scrape-michelin && npm run seed-production-clear
